name: Super Kid Run: Runner & Racing Games
name_original: Super Kid Run: Runner & Racing Games
description:
Super kid run : Runner & racing games
Young Teen ready to run and fight in the road!
The black tiger are hindering you to reach your goal you need to dash and run jump endlessly to collect shuriken to keep yourself defended from the attack of the black tiger and other obstacles.

- Jump to escape from obstacles
- Race and run as fast as possible!
- Collect the sharp knife like shurikens to defend yourself from the obstacles.

FEATURES
- Hidden Power-ups
- Game Center integration
- Very easy controls even kids can play it
- HD 3D graphics
- Endless Fun
- Fast-paced game with great graphics
